channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: People are getting rich in Dubai despite Middle East conflict
item.description: Dubai's economy is buzzing with tourism and construction as it positions itself as a safe haven in a region that's resting on a knife’s edge.

item.title: Bayer shares soar 12% after key U.S. legal win against Roundup cancer claims
item.description: Bayer shares rose as the company said it scored a legal victory in its suit over claims that exposure to its popular Roundup weed killer led to cancer.

item.title: Hynix leads rally of South Korean chip stocks
Investors, entrepreneurs, and good ideas are becoming collateral damage as the U.S. and China battle over dual-use tech
item.description: Nearly every civilian technology could be adapted to have military applications, which makes innovation increasingly complex and contentious.

item.title: Friday analyst calls: Media and entertainment companies take focus of upgrades, Estee Lauder cut
item.description: This is CNBC Pro's live coverage of Friday's analyst calls and Wall Street chatter.

item.title: Rally continues for mpox vaccine maker Bavarian Nordic
Mpox: Here’s what we know about the virus, and what might be done to contain it
item.description: The World Health Organization warned the virus might ultimately spill across international borders.

item.title: China's central bank says risks from local government debt have dropped
item.description: China's financial risks have dropped, including from local government debt, People's Bank of China Governor Pan Gongsheng said in interviews with state media.

item.title: Podcast: Crypto flexes its political muscle. And a new reality for homebuyers.
Ed Sheeran bought a 1.4% stake in his boyhood Premier League club Ipswich Town, bagging him executive suite access
item.description: The minority 1.4% stake won't see Sheeran join the board, but will secure him access to an executive box.

item.title: China's new loans hit a 15-year low, but investors 'should not panic'
item.description: China extended just 260 billion yuan of new loans in July, far less than the 450 billion yuan expected.

item.title: Mars-Kellanova deal likely to avoid antitrust hurdles, open door for more M&A
Bavarian Nordic gearing up to produce 10 million doses of mpox vaccine as ‘further imported cases’ in Europe are coming, WHO warns
item.description: Sweden announced the first mpox case outside Africa, the day after the WHO declared a global health emergency.

item.title: Ford upgrades Lincoln Navigator to include spa mode, 48-inch display for videos and gaming
item.description: The new features come as the automaker has redesigned the exterior and interior of the Lincoln Navigator for the 2025 model year.

item.title: Chipotle lost its CEO to Starbucks — but gained a wave of retail stock investors
